column5: My buddy & I made it out on Simcoe last Saturday for the first time this year & also our first time fishing "trout grounds"   & although it was windy & cold & fishing was slow....I did manage to catch 1 laker pushing 30", Which just so happens to be my first laker ever!      & to top things off, I caught it on my 24" UL setup...which was a blast!     I also caught a nice sized ciscoe & my buddy got about a 4lb whitefish.   Both the ciscoe & laker were released! Pic is kinda crappy as it was taken with my phone & the fish was moving  LOL
Great report and pic JMahon  The picture turned out very nice..... congratulations she's a real beauty Thanks for sharing Leechman
That is one fine lake trout,  very nice.
nice! im still waiting on my first
Great looking fish.  Perseverance pays off.
Hey - nice fish!  Just got my first laker this Sunday just past too - they sure are a lot of fun!
Great when you only catch one and it's Quality. Quantity is over rated ! lol
Sweet deal!  Very nice fish...first or not
Congrats JM on your first ever Laker!!!!....what a great lookin fish!!!.....now you're hooked   ...welcome to the troutin' club
